description: You need at least 6 vehicles on your Fleet Auto Pay service. You can select a vehicle already on your account or add a new one.

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["You need at least 6 vehicles on your Fleet Auto Pay service. You can select a vehicle already on your account or add a new one."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
If you're adding a vehicle to a 100% discount, this display may not update for 24 hours. It may still show as 'Should be paid' even though the discount is active.
This vehicle is currently registered for a 100% discount from the Congestion Charge. You can check when this discount expires in the 'Manage discounts' section of your account.
Based on the vehicle details entered and information held by the DVLA and TfL today, this vehicle is exempt from the ULEZ charge.
This may change - always check to see if you need to pay to drive within the zone.
Based on the vehicle details entered and information held by the DVLA and TfL today, you don't have to pay the ULEZ charge for this vehicle.
This may change - always check to see if you need to pay to drive within the zone.

This vehicle does not meet the ULEZ emissions standards. You need to pay the ULEZ charge if you drive within the zone. The zone operates at all times except Christmas Day - charging days run from midnight to midnight.
If you believe this is incorrect, and you can give us evidence that your vehicle does meet the ULEZ emissions standards, you will need to register it with us .

This vehicle does not meet the ULEZ emissions standards. You need to pay the ULEZ charge if you drive within the zone. The zone operates at all times except Christmas Day - charging days run from midnight to midnight.
If you believe this is incorrect, and you can give us evidence that your vehicle does meet the ULEZ emissions standards, you will need to register it with us .
